bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with niu pi xuan 牛皮癬 , ox-hide xuan -illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry niu 牛 quotes Guai zheng qi fang Book on internal medicine. Ming era, 怪證奇方 1544. : 牛皮風癬：生驢皮一塊，以朴消腌過，燒灰，油調搽 之，名一掃光 , “ Ox-hide wind- xuan -illness : a piece of raw donkey hide is pickled with pu xiao , burned to ashes, mixed with oil and applied externally. This is called ‘sweeping to have the luster return immediately’”.
